summary: A small player home in the bottom of the Solitude well.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/ELBk9rzl.png[/img]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][i][b]Vanilla Script-less Player Home.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/EmKpJ3Ll.png[/img]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][i][b]A Small Player Home in the bottom of the Solitude well.[/b][/i][/size][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][i][b][size=4]With all of the amenities that the Dragon born could drag into a well.
Located outside of Bits N Pieces near the well in Solitude.

[/size][/b][/i][/size][/font][/b][/i][/size][/font][img]http://i.imgur.com/M6XiuU8l.png[/img]

[size=5]Safe Storage:[/size]
11 Safe Storage Containers
3 Sword racks
2 Weapon Plaques
1 Mannequin
1 Bookcase with 2 Shelves

[size=5]Crafting:[/size]
Cooking Station
Blacksmith Anvil
Armor Workbench
Weapon Grindstone
Alchemy workstation
[size=5]
Other stuff:[/size]
3 Different Shrines Zenithar/Julianos/Arkay
1 Chair
1 Bucket
1 Invisible chair on the edge of the bed
Collision plane so stuff cant fall under the floor
Shadow casting Lights with no flicker or pop in

[size=5]Audio:[/size]
Cave acoustic space with wind/drip effects
Tavern ambient sounds in the distant background

[size=5]Navmesh:[/size]
Navmeshed and follower friendly with Idle markers


[img]http://i.imgur.com/fuWu3sel.png[/img]

It is just a .esp file so either install manually or with NMM.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/1oCtQ80l.jpg[/img]

None, Just Skyrim.


[img]http://i.imgur.com/QrkmiCNl.png[/img]

Me (mod) and Bethesda (game)
 [center] [font=Arial][color=#00B050][size=5][b]My Other Mods

[color=#efefef][size=3]Fallout 3 Mods
[font=Arial][color=#00B050][size=5][b][color=#efefef][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout3/mods/20339/?]Cains Refuge[/url]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/WkiwQrHl.png[/img]

It's mine, do not upload it to Steam or Bethesda.net.
 Ask before doing anything with it.[/center]
author: cain071546
